definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.chinese: 誰是第一個反對“地心說”的人？

sentences.english: Ptolemy's geocentric theory has been taken as an example of a paradigm.
sentences.chinese: 托勒密的地心說已被認爲是一個範式例子。

sentences.english: I wanna you take my hands, and say you love, with you heart sincerely.
sentences.chinese: 我想要你牽起我的手，用你真誠地心說出愛我。

sentences.english: Today, we all know that this "earth center theory" is wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天都知道“地心說”是錯誤的。
